Articles.Content: I was just wondering, how do you award/receive the little green reputation points? is it other people give them to you, or is it you post so many times, or what? I cannot seem to figure it out
You give them to others with that little star in the bottom left corner of each post.

See the sheriffs star under a post? Click it for posts you like

Felsmak is wearing his ninja pyjamas today I see

People give them to you for making an informative and/or otherwise utterly enjoyable post. See the little star under your post? Click that and try giving some rep.

EDIT: Ninja jammies? So is Sal.
Forum rep is how you know a poster is totally cool.

We can throw a ninja party!

It might be heavy. Maybe we could throw one ninja, but a whole party?

It might be heavy. Maybe we could throw one ninja, but a whole party?

Don't worry, we'll bring SRBs!
thanks guys. where did ninja pajamas and partys come from?

thanks guys. where did ninja pajamas and partys come from?

They came from space. They were given to us, and we love them.
Pyjama ninjas from outer space sounds like a nicktoons show, and it'd still be better than the recent ninja turtles movie....
This has gone way on a tangent...
It has, and it's time it went to the Kerbal network anyway.
Alright, alright. I'm closing this thread before we get too out of wack. The question's been answered and now the pajama ninjas are going a little...bananas.

As a post scriptum, here's some more information on the reputation system

Rowsdower what are you doing, no.. no... noooo!
